channel.title: How to make auto drag killers skull!
channel.description:
well.. i thought this would help u get some 'phr33 whipz!' well this is how u do it!
1. get green robes [preferably dark green with frog hat!] 2. go to dragons in lvl 22 wildy [any will do] 3. stand on top of a dragon [the same coulor ones as ur robes] 4. they will attack u because ur the same coulor as the dragons they will attack u like the auto chinks will stand on u while u wear that dark green robe 5. they think you are a dragon and die normaly but allways put smite on with a skull thier auto is known to press 'protect item'
and BAM u have yourself a whip! continue doing this untill loads of money! ^.^ hope it helped

item.title: How to make auto drag killers skull!
item.dc:creator: @dark_saber dark saber
item.description:
@dark_saber wrote:

well… i thought this would help u get some ‘phr33 whipz!’
well this is how u do it!

  1. get green robes [preferably dark green with frog hat!]
  2. go to dragons in lvl 22 wildy [any will do]
  3. stand on top of a dragon [the same coulor ones as ur robes]
  4. they will attack u because ur the same coulor as the dragons they will attack u like the auto chinks will stand on u while u wear that dark green robe
  5. they think you are a dragon and die normaly but allways put smite on with a skull thier auto is known to press ‘protect item’

and BAM u have yourself a whip! continue doing this untill loads of money! ^.^ hope it helped

Read full topic
